title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, published on PyPI as `ollama`.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as `ollama`.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (`langchain-ollama`) exposing Ollama models, embeddings and tools.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Android support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient CLI wrapper to pull, list and chat with models via Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-like suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with NuGet package `OllamaSharp`.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A & summarization.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that forwards channel messages to an Ollama model and posts replies.
